bibl.note: Introduction: Frontiers and Beyond. - Traditional Religion and the Rise of Christianity (289-639). - Christianity and Islam: A Precarious Balance (639-1173). - The Years of Decline (1173-1500). - Conclusions.

bibl.title: Christianity and Monasticism in Aswan and Nubia.

bibl.seg: Jacques van der Vliet, Contested Frontiers: Southern Egypt and Northern Nubia, AD 300-1500. The Evidence of the Inscriptions.
Gawdat Gabra & Hany N. Takla (edd.), Christianity and Monasticism in Aswan and Nubia (Cairo - New York, 2013) pp. 63-77.

Introduction: Frontiers and Beyond. - Traditional Religion and the Rise of Christianity (289-639). - Christianity and Islam: A Precarious Balance (639-1173). - The Years of Decline (1173-1500). - Conclusions.
